rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add one mana of any color. [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Even now, when nature has inexorably surrounded us, we build from the machinery we have. Perhaps that, too, is nature.”
—Olki, philosopher[/i]
